title: Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         The visitor center was originally constructed as part of the NPS Mission 66 program and officially named the Kris Eggle Visitor Center in 2003. NPS Photo  Kris Eggle Visitor Center Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument is open every day of the year. The Kris Eggle Visitor Center is open daily from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. On Thanksgiving and Christmas the visitor center is closed but the park remains open. Who Was Kris Eggle? Roads  Occasionally the scenic roads are closed, especially during the summer monsoon season. Please check current road status at the visitor center or call, 520-387-6849, ext 7302. The state of Arizona is on Mountain Standard time. It does not observe Daylight Savings Time.
